Title: Authorizes the board of trustees of the state university of New York to offer certain other non-resident tuition rates
Summary: Authorizes the board of trustees of the state university of New York to offer certain other non-resident tuition rates.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to authorizing the board of trustees of the state university of New York to offer certain non-resident undergraduate students separate tuition rates for attendance at selected state-operated institutions; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
